free.name: Ravenbound - Hammers of Ávalt
free.detailed_description:
The Hammers of Ávalt DLC introduces the new hammer weapon archetype to Ravenbound.



This pack adds hammer cards that you can collect and equip while exploring Ávalt, just like any other weapon type. All hammers have unique stats and effects to help you on your journey towards defeating the Betrayer.

In the Hammers of Ávalt DLC you will find 13 types of hammers:

Thunderstrike
Ashen Reckoning
The Shockwave
Stormcaller
The Tree Trunk
The Stonebreaker
Gravekeeper's Might
Fortunehammer
The Stone Sentinel
Icebreaker
The Silvery Crusher
Bloodseeker
The Worldshaper



Enjoy the pack of new hammers and use them while exploring the world of Ávalt.
